meanings.sent1: The tonicities of the muscles help maintain posture.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tonic.
meanings.sent1: The tonicities of the solution determined its effectiveness.
meanings.sent2: His speech had a certain tonicities that inspired confidence in the audience.
meanings.sent3: The artist's painting captured the vibrant tonicities of the sunset.
meanings.sent4: The tonicities of her personality shone through in every interaction.
meanings.sent5: The tonicities of the fabric made it ideal for athletic wear.
